snippet: With Andy Murray back, Britain should beat Argentina in Davis Cup this weekend for the first time since 1928 and make the final....
lead_paragraph: With Andy Murray back, Britain should beat Argentina in Davis Cup this weekend for the first time since 1928 and make the final.

headline.print_headline: Davis Cup: Murray Gives Britain Lift vs Argentina in Semis
headline.main: Davis Cup: Murray Gives Britain Lift vs Argentina in Semis
